Articles.Content:
Gather around

Here's the new plane for every mission you can think of ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) Moddable, space capable, single seat science craft for all your kerbal needs.

Now, all it needs is a name. If you have a good suggestion, please leave it on comments. 

![6D46E7343B91224B0C5A9244CA60A4D310E1EE1D](http://cloud-4.steamusercontent.com/ugc/544148636810808291/6D46E7343B91224B0C5A9244CA60A4D310E1EE1D/)

Also, it's quite "durable". Flies nicely with minor damage as well.

![10582C5A89E1ECEA774D868FF823E10DB126E5E5](http://cloud-4.steamusercontent.com/ugc/544148636810808737/10582C5A89E1ECEA774D868FF823E10DB126E5E5/)

Here's a download link incase you want to take her out for a spin.

[https://drive.google.com/file/d/0ByXRIbLpNYqocXp1ckVQWHQ0X2M/view?usp=sharing](https://drive.google.com/file/d/0ByXRIbLpNYqocXp1ckVQWHQ0X2M/view?usp=sharing)
I suggest the Condor. Thin body, large wings, and quite enduring!

I like condor ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) Single engine plane doesnt go fast enough for me to be called as hawk. Well, atleast with single rapier.

You call that "minor" damage? Half of its wings are gone at least, and it's lost all aerodynamics... *minor damage* my ... uhh... rear-end-of-a-mule...

I don't know why, but I want to call it the "gaseous buzzard on acid."

I know, I'm a bit weird sometimes.... most of the time... well, okay... *all of the time.*
